content: **crochet baby blanket in 2 threads drops alpaca** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurements** approx 58 x 72 cm / 22¾ x 28 3/8 **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 400 g color no 8105 light steel blue drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm / us 7 or size needed to get 1 square = 14 x 14 cm / 5½ x 5½ **pattern links ** french version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b18&d_id=20
